thread.title: Teenage girl among four suspects arrested for 'planning new terror attack on Paris'
thread.title_full: Teenage girl among four suspects arrested for 'planning new terror attack on Paris'

author: Lizzie Dearden
title: Teenage girl among four suspects arrested for 'planning new terror attack on Paris'
text:
14 GMT Click to followThe Independent Online 
A 16-year-old girl is among four people arrested for allegedly planning a new terror attack in France. 
The teenager was arrested in Montpellier on Friday morning by counter-terror police. 
Local reports said the group were suspected of planning a suicide bombing attack in an unspecified "tourist area" of Paris. 
Explosives and other equipment were reportedly found during house searches, sources told Info M6 . 
More to follow
